definition: large semiaquatic rodent with webbed hind feet and a broad flat tail, to work hard on something
details:
noun
- large semiaquatic rodent with webbed hind feet and a broad flat tail
- a hat made with the fur of a beaver (or similar material)
= synonyms: castor
- a movable piece of armor on a medieval helmet used to protect the lower face
- a man's hat with a tall crown
= example: a man's hat with a tall crown
= synonyms: dress hat
- a full beard
- the soft brown fur of the beaver
= synonyms: beaver fur
verb
- to work hard on something
= example: to work hard on something
= synonyms: beaver away
